attributes.action: Introduce an age limit and requirement for ID to be produced for energy drinks.
attributes.additional_details: i personally think that these drinks should have a higher age limit, similar to alcohol and the need for ID to be presented is a must.
attributes.background: Government has raised concerns/awareness on the general health of the UK public, especially children, and the strain it puts onto the NHS due to poor diet. Most large chain stores adhere to stricter guidelines on the sales of energy drinks to under 16 year olds, smaller/local businesses do not.
